text.content:
[say] Hello! Welcome to TestFlow
----
[say] Please enter a input [allow barge in]
[hear] "input" [check for] number
----

vxml.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<vxml version="2.1">
	<form>
		<block><prompt>Hello! Welcome</prompt></block>
		<field name="input" type="number">
			<prompt bargein="true">Please enter a input</prompt>
		</field>
	<filled mode="all" namelist="input">	<submit next="${internal.nextURL}" />
	</filled>
	</form>
</vxml>

kookoo.content: Unfortunately only the default renderer is registered for the [kookoo] format, which as you can see doesn't do much, other than displaying this helpful message :)

<vxml version="2.1">
	<form>
		<block><prompt>Welcome to the active node</prompt></block>
	</form>
</vxml>

		<block><prompt>Welcome to the inactive node</prompt></block>
	</form>
